com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops

  • Uses of Angle in com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops

    Methods in com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops with parameters of type Angle
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    RotatePagesOperation.setAngleToRotatePagesBy(Angle angle)
    Sets angle (in clockwise direction) for rotating all the pages of the input PDF file.
    void
    RotatePagesOperation.setAngleToRotatePagesBy(Angle angle, PageRanges pageRanges)
    Sets angle (in clockwise direction) for rotating the specified pages of the input PDF file; can be invoked multiple times to set rotation for different set of page ranges.
